summary_section.title: Summary of Findings
summary_section.description: This section provides a concise summary of the patient's risk signals and the rationale for recommending a specialist consultation.
summary_section.framing: The summary should be framed in a way that is informative and supportive, emphasizing the potential benefits of consulting a specialist.
summary_section.tone: The tone should be empathetic and reassuring, aiming to alleviate any concerns the patient may have about their health.
summary_section.what_this_means: This section should clearly explain what the findings mean for the patient's health and why a specialist consultation is recommended.
summary_section.limitations: It is important to acknowledge any limitations of the analysis, including the fact that no real patient data is being used and that this is a mock-up for demonstration purposes.
summary_section.next_steps: This section should outline the recommended next steps for the patient, including how to schedule a consultation with a specialist and what to expect during the consultation.
